flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: This is what the finished Duck Tape Rose will look like.
lines.text_raw: This is what the finished Duck Tape Rose will look like.

lines.text: This is a VERY EASY and fun project..let's get started.
lines.text_raw: This is a VERY EASY and fun project..let's get started.

lines.text: Using your ruler, cut a bunch (25ish) pieces of duck tape 2" long.
lines.text_raw: Using your ruler, cut a bunch (25ish) pieces of duck tape 2" long.

lines.text: Fold piece as shown in picture 1. Make sure you leave the edge - that will secure your next fold.
lines.text_raw: Fold piece as shown in picture 1. Make sure you leave the edge - that will secure your next fold.

lines.text: Fold the other corner over making a point. See picture 2.
lines.text_raw: Fold the other corner over making a point. See picture 2.

lines.text: The bottom should be left sticky.
lines.text_raw: The bottom should be left sticky.

lines.text: Make a bunch. I think I used around 20-25. This will depend on you..how full of a rose do you want to make?
lines.text_raw: Make a bunch. I think I used around 20-25. This will depend on you..how full of a rose do you want to make?

lines.text: Take your pencil or stick - anything round will do.
lines.text_raw: Take your pencil or stick - anything round will do.

lines.text: Wrap one petal around the pencil.
lines.text_raw: Wrap one petal around the pencil.

lines.text: Put the next one just slightly to one side. Wrap it around.
lines.text_raw: Put the next one just slightly to one side. Wrap it around.

lines.text: Continue with the rest of your petals.
lines.text_raw: Continue with the rest of your petals.

lines.text: Wasn't that easy? Make them in lots of different colors. Have fun!
lines.text_raw: Wasn't that easy? Make them in lots of different colors. Have fun!

guide.summary: Make a rose out of that universal material: duck tape.
guide.title: Duck Tape Rose
